meanings.definition: The process by which cells become specialized in structure and function during development.
meanings.sent1: During embryonic growth, cytodifferentiations occur to create various cell types.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study cytodifferentiations to understand how cells develop specific functions.
meanings.sent3: The cell party was a hit, with each cell showing off its unique cytodifferentiations.
meanings.sent4: In the orchestra of life, cytodifferentiations play the melody of specialization.
meanings.sent5: The kaleidoscope of cytodifferentiations in the body paints a beautiful picture of diversity.

meanings.definition: The differentiation of cells into different types within an organism.
meanings.sent1: Cytodifferentiations in the body lead to the formation of various cell types.
meanings.sent2: The process of cytodifferentiations ensures that each cell has a specific role.
meanings.sent3: The cytodifferentiations in the petri dish seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The garden of cytodifferentiations bloomed with a variety of cellular flowers.
meanings.sent5: The dance of cytodifferentiations choreographs the harmony of cellular diversity.
